name: Ahli Baba's Kabob Shop
notes: Nice little shop that serves delicious street food.

name: American Flatbread
hours: Monday - Friday: 11:30 a.m. - 3:00 p.m. & 5:00 p.m. - 11:30 p.m. Saturday - Sunday: 11:30 a.m. - 11:30 p.m.
notes: Great pizza doing good for the community!
No reservations, first come first served seating.
Lively choice for craft beer & inventive wood-fired pizzas loaded with organic, seasonal toppings.

name: August First
notes: Homemade and from scratch breakfast and lunch made with natural ingredients!
Fantastic baked goods!
Catering, and Private Parties available!

name: City Market
notes: Delicious salad bar, prepared hot and cold foods, plus sandwiches.

name: El Cortijo Taqueria
hours: Sunday: 10:00am to 10:00pm, Monday-Thursday: 11:00am to 10:00pm, Friday: 11:00am to 12:00am, Saturday: 10:00am to 12:00am
notes: A member of the Farmhouse group.
Over 25 varieties of Tequila

name: Farmhouse Tap and Grill
hours: Sunday: 10:00am to 11:00pm, Monday-Thursday: 11:00am to 11:00pm, Friday: 11:00am to 12:00am, Saturday: 10:00am to 12:00am
notes: A member of the Farmhouse group
Localy sourced produce, and meat.

name: Fu Da Chinese Restaurant
hours: Sunday: 12:00pm to 10:30pm, Monday-Tuesday & Thursday: 11:00am to 10:30pm, Friday-Saturady: 11:00am to 11:00pm, Closed Wednesday
notes: Known for its modern interpretation of classic dishes and its insistence on only using high quality fresh ingredients.
No-frills nook for hearty counter-serve or take-out Chinese standards such as chow mein.

name: Gaku Ramen
notes: Authentic Japanese cuisine in the Green Mountains.
Huge bowls of ramen, come hungry!
Decent potstickers, nothing special really.

name: Halvorson's
hours: Monday-Thursday: 11:00am to 9:00pm, Friday: 11:00am to 10:00pm, Saturday: 10:00am to 10:00pm, Sunday: 10:00am to 9:00pm
notes: Owned and operated by the Halvorson family for over 30 years.
Beautiful back patio.
Juicy burgers, craft beer, and hearty comfort food in a cozy, family friendly atmosphere.

name: Hen of The Wood
notes: $1 oyster happy hour 4pm-5pm.
$23 dollar brocolli to die for.
boho vermont farm chic with a cozy ambiance.
The flavors of the food and strength of the cocktails makes up for the snotty first impression and expensive prices.
Intimate eatery featuring daily menus of local, seasonal fare, craft cocktails & understated decor.

name: Henry's Diner
notes: Voted the best diner in Vermont by American Express.
A great place to enjoy a meal with family and friends!
Breakfast all day!

name: Honey Road
notes: $13 dollar brocolli to die for.
Recommended for the not so hungry who like to share food.
Hummus is Yummus!
Good cocktails, great desserts.
Rad pink neon sign.

name: Istanbul Kebab House
notes: Burlington's only rooftop dining!
Family-run restaurant & bar serving Turkish-Mediterranean fare in a bright, multi-level space.

name: Kountry Kart Deli
notes: Home of the world famous Shiner!

name: Leunig's Bistro
notes: Leunig's Bistro is one of the oldest, continually operating restaurants in downtown Burlington.
A French bistro & bar, serving lunch, brunch and dinner.

name: Mr. Mike's
hours: Sunday - Wednesday: 11:00 a.m. - 1:00 a.m. Thursday - Saturday: 11:00 a.m. - 3 a.m.
notes: The greatest pizza around! call 864-0072 or order online for free delivery!

name: Pascolo Ristorante
notes: Authentic Southern Italian cuisine
A member of the Farmhouse Group

name: Red Panda
notes: Authentic Nepali, Indian, Indo-Chinese Cuisine
Our highly trained chefs pride themselves on creating a unique culinary experience combining traditional and asian fusion dishes.

name: A Single Pebble
notes: Great asian food, a bit on the pricey side, but worth it.
Open for lunch on Fridays.

name: Sweetwaters
notes: Classy, casual standby for elevated takes on American faves, with a roomy patio for people-watching.
Sweetwaters has served locals and visitors alike for over 35 years.

name: The Friendly Toast
hours: Sunday: 8:00am to 7:00pm, Monday-Tuesday: 8:00am to 2:30pm, Wednesday-Saturday: 8:00am to 9:00pm
notes: Serves up creative meals in a truly unique atmosphere.
Uses the freshest ingredients (locally sourced whenever possible) and are environmentally friendly.
